      Constructors in AccessSystem.Logging with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      AccessLogger(java.lang.String uniName, Controller controller)
      Default constructor that makes a new instance of the base logger class and a initialises loggerEntries as an ArrayList.

      Default constructor: get an instance of the current date and uses it as part of the file name.
      EmergencyLogger(java.lang.String uniName, Controller controller)
      Default Constructor: creates a new base logger and passes university name and initialises logger entries as ArrayList.
